nodes.text: House Serenno, also known as House Dooku, was the ruling family of the planet Serenno, which was named after them. The other noble houses were under the authority of House Serenno's head, the Count of Serenno. After leaving the Jedi Order, Dooku took up his legacy, and became Count of Serenno. The house's sigil was etched into a stained glass window at the far end of the Great Hall in Castle Serenno.
